meanings.sent1: The main character in the story was brave and kind.
meanings.sent2: The main reason for the celebration was the team's victory.
meanings.sent3: The main dish at the party was a giant cake shaped like a castle.
meanings.sent4: Her main goal in life was to spread happiness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The main mountain in the range stood tall and majestic against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The main idea of the book was to always be kind to others.
meanings.sent2: The main purpose of the meeting was to discuss the new project.
meanings.sent3: The main joke at the party had everyone laughing until they cried.
meanings.sent4: His main focus during the exam was to answer every question correctly.
meanings.sent5: The main melody of the song lingered in her mind long after it ended.

meanings.definition: Primary or central in location or position
meanings.sent1: The main street in town was lined with colorful shops.
meanings.sent2: The main entrance to the building was through the grand double doors.
meanings.sent3: The main seat at the table was reserved for the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: Her main spot in the garden was under the old oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The main building in the city square was a historic landmark.
